title: Obscura 3 camera app brings a revamped interface and new capture modes
content:
Obscura is one of the most popular professional camera apps for iOS, as it enables multiple manual controls for shooting photos on iPhone. Developer Ben McCarthy this week released Obscura 3, which comes with a revamped interface, new capture modes, and other new features.

more…

The post Obscura 3 camera app brings a revamped interface and new capture modes appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Popular iPhone camera app Obscura 3 comes with a revamped interface, new capture modes, and other new features.
